note.p: Daughter of Richard Litchfield and his wife Sarah Elizabeth Buckley; sister of Richard Buckley Litchfield. Married Henry George Tuke (1831/2–92), a solicitor, in 1856.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/2659/38/32)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 11 June 2020)
